name: bbdkp/bbguild
description: bbGuild Extension for phpBB 3.1. bbGuild is a Guild Manager for your phpBB3 Bulletin board. Features : Integration of Game, Guild management facilities; Clean report screens, Player, Roster, ACP and UCP modules. Games supported : World of Warcraft, The Lord of the Rings Online, Dark Age of Camelot, Vanguard, EverQuest I/II,  Warhammer Online, Final Fantasy XI, AION, Rift, SW:Tor, Lineage 2, TERA, FFXIV and Custom Game. Languages supported : English, French, German, Italian. Robust admin features, no Installation headaches, just copy into ext folder and enable the extension.  There will be a number of extension plugins, DKP Manager, Raidtracker, bbTips, Apply, Bossprogress, Raidplanner. Further development requests, support questions are welcome at http://www.avathar.be/bbdkp or @bbDKP on Twitter.
